titles.title: To designate certain mountain peaks in the State of Colorado as "Fowler Peak" and "Boskoff Peak".
Fowler and Boskoff Peaks Designation Act
Fowler and Boskoff Peaks Designation Act
Fowler and Boskoff Peaks Designation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Fowler and Boskoff Peaks Designation Act
This bill designates specified mountain peaks in the Uncompahgre National Forest in Colorado as "Fowler Peak" and "Boskoff Peak."
